channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- FactoryTalk® Services Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- FactoryTalk® Services Platform

item.title: CVE-2023-46290|2024-08-02T20:45:40.833Z -- rockwell%20automation -- factorytalk%C2%AE%20services%20platform
item.description: Due to inadequate code logic, a previously unauthenticated threat actor could potentially obtain a local Windows OS user token through the FactoryTalk® Services Platform web service and then use the token to log in into FactoryTalk® Services Platform . This vulnerability can only be exploited if the authorized user did not previously log in into the FactoryTalk® Services Platform web service.
